main.name: ROI MEDICAL
main.description: We help medical professionals get high ROI by implementing online digital marketing. GET FOUND ONLINE
main.bio: A great website that converts visitors into patients is a key piece of a winning practice marketing strategy. But the best medical website in the world is useless if no one ever visits it. Our goal is to bring more patients to your practice by bringing more visitors to your website. We do that through Search Engine Marketing (SEM), and Social Media Marketing (SMM) campaigns.
main.bio3: We specialize in SEO for dentists, orthodontists, and related medical professionals. While others are constantly shifting focus between markets, we are doing one thing – working to provide our medical clients the best rankings possible.
main.bio4: SEM involves creating and managing Pay-Per-Click (PPC) ads that target people specifically searching for the various medical treatments and services you provide. While organic rankings tend to be the best value over time, a Google Ads campaign can bring PPC traffic to your practice website instantly.
main.bio5: SMM is advertising on sites like Facebook. Instead of targeting specific searches, the goal of SMM is to raise general awareness of your dental practice, and introduce local folks to the personality and character of your practice.

education.description: Jedna z lepších NYC škol zaměřená na business. Naučila mě jak se starat o finance.

work.title: Zakladatelka
work.description: Po dobu 6i let jsem vedla obchod, který prodával oblečení Avril Lavigne. Obchod měl přes 10 000 likes a byl v BRAVO magazínu.

testimonials.text: We only offer our services to one practice/specialty in a geographic region. Other marketing companies will take on several competing practices in the same city, meaning that they are spending at least as much time actively working against you as they are working for you when they are trying to rank your competitors. We are solely focused on making you the top practice in your target market.
